name: Colossal Head #01: “Monumento 1” (La Venta)
description:
The "Colossal Heads" are a collection of 17 designs inspired by the sculptures created by the Olmecs, they were the oldest civilization in Mesoamerica (c. 2400 - 400 BCE) and one of the oldest in the world, they are attributed many advances and contributions to the cultures that preceded them, they were the creators of the "colossal heads" monuments that even today continue to surprise many.

Las “Cabezas Colosales” son una coleccion de 17 diseños inspirados en las esculturas creadas por los olmecas, fueron la civilizacion más antigua en mesoamerica (aprox. 2400 - 400 a. e. c.) y una de las más antiguas del mundo, se les atribuyen muchos avances y aportes a las culturas que los precedieron, ellos fueron los creadores de las “cabezas colosales” monumentos que aun hoy en dia siguen sorprendiendo a muchos.
